reference.shortdesc: The conbodydiv element provides an container for content that might be grouped within a concept topic.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: There are no additional semantics attached to the conbodydiv element. It is purely a grouping element that is provided to help organize content for reuse.
The content model of the conbodydiv element only permits section and example.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The conbodydiv element is specialized from bodydiv. It is defined in the concept module.
